text:
Energy Co-ordination and Planning Order 2021

I make the following order under the Energy Co-ordination and Planning Act 1995 .

20 August 2021

GUY BARNETT

Minister for Energy and Emissions Reduction

1. Short title
    This order may be cited as the Energy Co-ordination and Planning Order 2021 .

2. Commencement
    This order takes effect on the day on which its making is notified in the Gazette.

3. Interpretation
        (1) In this order â€“
            Act means the Energy Co-ordination and Planning Act 1995 .
        (2) The Acts Interpretation Act 1931 applies to the interpretation of this order as if this order were by-laws.

4. Prudent storage level
    For the purposes of section 3A of the Act, the PSL applicable from the first of each month is as follows:
    Month  Prudent storage level (%)  1. January  37.7  2. February  33.9  3. March  30.7  4. April  28.2  5. May  26.9  6. June  28.4  7. July  29.7  8. August  32.8  9. September  37.1  10. October  39.5  11. November  40.8  12. December  39.5
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     
    

    5. High reliability level
        For the purposes of section 3A of the Act, the HRL applicable from the first of each month is as follows:
        Month  High reliability level (%)  1. January  31.8  2. February  26.8  3. March  23.7  4. April  20.0  5. May  19.0  6. June  19.3  7. July  21.7  8. August  23.9  9. September  29.8  10. October  32.0  11. November  32.5  12. December  31.6
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
        

        6. Legislation revoked
            The legislation specified in Schedule 1 is revoked.

        SCHEDULE 1 - Legislation revoked

        Clause 6

        Energy Co-ordination and Planning Order 2019 (No. 90 of 2019)
                                                                     
        

        Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

        Notified in the Gazette on 1 September 2021

        This order is administered in the Department of State Growth.
